title: Regeneron shares fall after FDA rejects high-dose eye disease treatment
description: Regeneron said the rejection was "solely due to an ongoing review of inspection findings at a third-party filler."

title: Google distances itself from planned drag performance after employee petition
description: Google has distanced itself from a planned drag show after some employees signed a petition opposing the Pride event.

title: Don't budget, says financial psychologist. Here's why he recommends a 'spending plan' instead
description: Budgeting helps address areas you need to control but can come across as restrictive. Spending plans offer more freedom.

title: Severe weather, FAA shortfalls kick off rocky start to summer air travel
description: United's CEO blamed FAA staffing shortages for worsening flight disruptions over the weekend.

title: Unity shares rise 12% after company announces A.I. marketplace
description: AI companies will be able to distribute their software to game makers and charge for it through Unity's Asset Store.

title: Lordstown Motors files for bankruptcy, sues Foxconn over $170 million funding deal
description: Lordstown also said it would put itself up for sale amid an ongoing dispute with Taiwan's Foxconn.

title: Shocked by the speed of the Wagner revolt, Russia's neighbors want to beef up NATO's eastern flank
description: The fallout of the Wagner Group's short-lived armed rebellion has raised the alarm among Europe's Baltic countries.

title: China decoupling would be an act of 'suicide' for Europe, Hungary's foreign minister says
description: Hungary's Foreign Minister said Tuesday that any move to decouple, or even derisk, from China would be an act of "suicide" for Europe.

title: Airbnb is offering a free stay at Barbie's Malibu Dreamhouse—here's how to book
description: The all-pink listing is hosted by Ken — played by Ryan Gosling in the upcoming film — and looks like the iconic Barbie playset come to life.

title: Trump's latest attack includes special counsel's family after bombshell tape revealed
description: Trump railed against Smith and his criminal case, and asked "somebody" to "explain" his position to the special counsel, his family and his friends.

title: Here's how a merger between PGA Tour and LIV Golf would be structured
description: News of the deal structure comes ahead of a Senate hearing, in which top brass of all the parties have been asked to testify.

title: Wise shares spike 18% as higher interest rates help fintech triple profits
description: Wise said in a statement to the stock market that its profit before tax nearly tripled to £146.5 million ($186.5 million).

title: Markets are pricing in rate cuts too soon, IMF's Gopinath says
description: Major central banks will have to hold rates high for much longer than some investors expect, the IMF's Gita Gopinath told CNBC Tuesday.

title: A U.S. recession is coming this year, HSBC warns — with Europe to follow in 2024
description: The U.S. will enter a downturn in the fourth quarter, followed by a "year of contraction and a European recession in 2024," according to HSBC Asset Management.

title: Lagarde says inflation still too high in euro area, cannot declare victory yet
description: European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde said Tuesday that inflation is still too high and it's still too early to declare victory over consumer price rises.

title: China's Baidu claims its Ernie Bot beats ChatGPT on key tests as A.I. race heats up
description: Baidu said the artificial intelligence model called Ernie 3.5 outperformed OpenAI's ChatGPT and GPT 4 in several key areas.

title: CNBC Daily Open: Tech, meet reality
description: Tech stocks slumped across the board as enthusiasm over artificial intelligence was replaced by a more clear-eyed view of today’s economic conditions.

title: Malaysia's sovereign wealth fund seeks greater portfolio resilience in volatile markets
description: Khazanah invested more than half its portfolio in public markets in 2022 and more than doubled its net profit last year compared to the year before.

title: Saudi Aramco looks to China and India to prop up oil markets
description: Aramco's CEO Amin Nasser believes that the oil market fundamentals remain generally "sound" for the rest of the year.

title: China is still on track to hit its growth target, Premier Li Qiang says
description: Chinese Premier Li Qiang said Tuesday his country was still on track to reach its annual growth target of around 5%.

title: Google execs admit users are 'not quite happy' with search experience after Reddit blackouts
description: Google executives acknowledged this month they need to do a better job surfacing user-generated content after the recent Reddit blackouts.

title: Microsoft CEO Nadella said last year goal is to reach $500 billion in sales by 2030, court filing shows
description: A court filing released on Monday showed that last year Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella provided a goal for his company's top-line financials through 2030.
